bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON COUNTY OF SPOKANE} ss
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney Spokane Falls, Spokane county, in said Territory.
To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting:

In the Name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon John Sengfielder and Thomas Thevaite to be and appear before the 4th Jud. Dist Court at the Court House, in Cheney Spokane Falls in said County, on the instante day of May A.D. 1887, at 930 o'clock A.M., to there give evidence in the above entitled cause on the part of said Plaintiff
WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of the Court and Seal thereof affixed, this 30 day of May A.D. 1887.
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Chas B. Johnston Deputy
Territory of Washington, County of Spokane} ss
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to them in said County, on this 30 day of May A.D. 1887.
James Glispin, Sheriff
By A.J. Duncan, Deputy.
Territory of Washington, County of Spokane} ss
Case No. 1886
SUBPOENA
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory.
Plaintiff
vs.
Defendant
Returned and filed this 30th day of May A.D. 1887 D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy
SHERIFF'S FEES. Serving 2 names at .40 .80 Mileage 4 miles at .10 .40 Total - - - - $1.20
Serve at once
